ccre.instinct

Class InstinctModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • ccre.instinct.InstinctModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventOutput

    public abstract class InstinctModule
extends java.lang.Object
implements EventOutput
    The base class for an Instinct (the simple autonomous subsystem) module.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      InstinctModule()
      Create a new InstinctModule that needs to be registered with an InstinctRegistrar before it can run.
      InstinctModule(BooleanInputPoll shouldBeRunning)
      Create a new InstinctModule with a BooleanInputPoll controlling when this module should run.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      The location for the main code of this InstinctModule.
      void event()
      Fire the event.
      protected java.lang.String getTypeName()
      The name of this control loop.
      void setShouldBeRunning(BooleanInputPoll when)
      Sets this module to run when the specified BooleanInputPoll is true.
      void updateWhen(EventInput src)
      Sets this module to be updated (continue execution) when the specified event is produced.
      protected void waitForEvent(EventInput source)
      Wait until the specified EventSource is produced before returning.
      protected void waitForTime(long milliseconds)
      Wait for the specified amount of time.
      protected void waitUntil(BooleanInputPoll waitFor)
      Wait until the specified BooleanInputPoll becomes true before returning.
      protected void waitUntilAtLeast(FloatInputPoll waitFor, float minimum)
      Wait until the specified FloatInputPoll reaches or rises above the specified minimum.
      protected void waitUntilAtMost(FloatInputPoll waitFor, float maximum)
      Wait until the specified FloatInputPoll reaches or falls below the specified maximum.
      protected int waitUntilOneOf(BooleanInputPoll... waitFor)
      Wait for one of the specified conditions to become true before returning.

    • Constructor Detail

      • InstinctModule

        public InstinctModule(BooleanInputPoll shouldBeRunning)
        Create a new InstinctModule with a BooleanInputPoll controlling when this module should run.
        Parameters:
        shouldBeRunning - The input to control the running of this module.

      • InstinctModule

        public InstinctModule()
        Create a new InstinctModule that needs to be registered with an InstinctRegistrar before it can run.

    • Method Detail

      • getTypeName

        protected java.lang.String getTypeName()
        The name of this control loop. Defaults to "autonomous mode".
        Returns:
        The name to use in printouts.

      • setShouldBeRunning

        public void setShouldBeRunning(BooleanInputPoll when)
        Sets this module to run when the specified BooleanInputPoll is true. You also need to fire the InstinctModule's event - likely with updateWhen().
        Parameters:
        when - When this should be running.
        See Also:
        updateWhen(ccre.channel.EventInput)

      • updateWhen

        public void updateWhen(EventInput src)
        Sets this module to be updated (continue execution) when the specified event is produced.
        Parameters:
        src - The event to wait for to continue execution.

      • event

        public final void event()
        Description copied from interface: EventOutput
        Fire the event.
        Specified by:
        event in interface EventOutput

      • waitUntil

        protected void waitUntil(BooleanInputPoll waitFor)
                  throws AutonomousModeOverException,
                         java.lang.InterruptedException
        Wait until the specified BooleanInputPoll becomes true before returning.
        Parameters:
        waitFor - The condition to wait until.
        Throws:
        AutonomousModeOverException - If the autonomous mode has ended.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Possibly also if autonomous mode has ended.

      • waitForEvent

        protected void waitForEvent(EventInput source)
                     throws AutonomousModeOverException,
                            java.lang.InterruptedException
        Wait until the specified EventSource is produced before returning.
        Parameters:
        source - The event to wait for.
        Throws:
        AutonomousModeOverException - If the autonomous mode has ended.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Possibly also if autonomous mode has ended.

      • waitUntilOneOf

        protected int waitUntilOneOf(BooleanInputPoll... waitFor)
                      throws AutonomousModeOverException,
                             java.lang.InterruptedException
        Wait for one of the specified conditions to become true before returning.
        Parameters:
        waitFor - The conditions to check.
        Returns:
        The index of the first condition that became true.
        Throws:
        AutonomousModeOverException - If the autonomous mode has ended.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Possibly also if autonomous mode has ended.

      • waitUntilAtLeast

        protected void waitUntilAtLeast(FloatInputPoll waitFor,
                                float minimum)
                         throws AutonomousModeOverException,
                                java.lang.InterruptedException
        Wait until the specified FloatInputPoll reaches or rises above the specified minimum.
        Parameters:
        waitFor - The value to monitor.
        minimum - The threshold to wait for the value to reach.
        Throws:
        AutonomousModeOverException - If the autonomous mode has ended.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Possibly also if autonomous mode has ended.

      • waitUntilAtMost

        protected void waitUntilAtMost(FloatInputPoll waitFor,
                               float maximum)
                        throws AutonomousModeOverException,
                               java.lang.InterruptedException
        Wait until the specified FloatInputPoll reaches or falls below the specified maximum.
        Parameters:
        waitFor - The value to monitor.
        maximum - The threshold to wait for the value to reach.
        Throws:
        AutonomousModeOverException - If the autonomous mode has ended.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Possibly also if autonomous mode has ended.

      • waitForTime

        protected void waitForTime(long milliseconds)
                    throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                           AutonomousModeOverException
        Wait for the specified amount of time.
        Parameters:
        milliseconds - The amount of time to wait for.
        Throws:
        AutonomousModeOverException - If the autonomous mode has ended.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Possibly also if autonomous mode has ended.

      • autonomousMain

        protected abstract void autonomousMain()
                                throws AutonomousModeOverException,
                                       java.lang.InterruptedException
        The location for the main code of this InstinctModule.
        Throws:
        AutonomousModeOverException - Propagate this up here when thrown by any waiting method.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Propagate this up here when thrown by any waiting method.
